attributes.action: Make MPs do the job they were elected to do (represent the people who voted for them)
attributes.additional_details: For to long now MPs have ignored the will of the people and treated with contempt those of us that elected them in the first place. lets introduce a system whereby instead of one hundred thousand votes Possibly triggering a debate, lets make that the amount of eligible votes neede to remove an MP who we think is under representative of the area REPRESENTED
